name: Arctic Winds
desc:
Chilling winds blow forth in a 30 foot long, 5 foot wide line. Creatures inside must make a Constitution saving throw or take 3d4 cold damage.

The winds remain for 1 minute. Creatures moving against the winds use 2 feet of movement for every 1 foot moved.
empower: Range increased to 45 feet. A successful saving throw deals half damage.
author: CrusaderDroid
